org.jconverter

Class JConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jconverter.JConverter
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    JConverterProxy

    public class JConverter
extends Object
    A conversion context. Its main components are: - The converter manager. - The instantiation manager. - The type solver manager.
    Author:
    sergioc
